channel.title: George R.R. Martin on un01s notes
channel.description: Recent content in George R.R. Martin on un01s notes

item.title: two types of writers
item.description: â€œI think there are two types of writers, the architects and the gardeners. The architects plan everything ahead of time, like an architect building a house. They know how many rooms are going to be in the house, what kind of roof they’re going to have, where the wires are going to run, what kind of plumbing there’s going to be. They have the whole thing designed and blueprinted out before they even nail the first board up.
